name: SRI Consultants Ltd T/A sriServices
goal:
To support and encourage the growth of retail sustainable, responsible and ethical investment.

Activities include specialist consultancy and the provision of free to use, fund manager supported, online information through our website www.FundEcoMarket.co.uk .
interests: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives: I am currently responding to the HLEG Sustainable Finance draft report and have previously responded to EOS PRIIPS consultation.
